parameters.description: Array of split member references, e.g.: Face2 IRefPlane Member

title: IStructureSystemSplitMember.SetSplitReferences

parameters.name: References
parameters.description: Array of split member references, e.g.: Face2 IRefPlane Member

returns: True if split member references successfully set, false if not
remarks:
This method is valid only if
IStructureSystemSplitMember::MemberType
is set to
swStructureSplitMemberType_e
.swStructureSplitMember_Reference.
